data.text: Ateneneefoɔ wu,
Wɔn a wɔnante tee no
“Nanso, mo, mommra ha, mo ɔbayifoɔ mmammarima,
Hwan na moresere no?
Mode ɔpɛ mmorosoɔ bɔ afɔdeɛ wɔ adum mu
Anyame a wɔyɛ aboɔ tromtrom, a ɛwɔ mmɔnhwa a emu dɔ mu no,
Moasiesie mo daberɛ wɔ kokoɔ a ɛkorɔn so;
Mo apono ne aponnwa akyi
Mode ngo kɔɔ Molek nkyɛn
Mo nneyɛɛ maa mo brɛeɛ,
“Hwan na wama mo akoma atu na wabɔ mo hu sei
Mɛda mo tenenee ne mo nnwuma adi,
Sɛ moteam pɛ mmoa a,
Na wɔbɛka sɛ:
Na yei ne deɛ ɔkorɔn no,
Meremmɔ soboɔ afebɔɔ,
Wɔn nnebɔne adufudepɛ maa me bo fuiɛ;
Mahunu wɔn nneyɛɛ, nanso mɛsa wɔn yadeɛ.
na mama ayɛyie aba wɔn a wɔredi awerɛhoɔ wɔ Israel ano.
Na amumuyɛfoɔ te sɛ ɛpo a ɛrehuru,
“Amumuyɛfoɔ nni asomdwoeɛ.” Sei na me Onyankopɔn seɛ.
